title: E-Commerce Website
description: An E-Commerce web application where users can browse products, add items to the cart, and place orders.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio built with React and CSS Modules to showcase my skills, projects, and contact information. Includes a WhatsApp-integrated contact form.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecasting web app that provides real-time weather updates using OpenWeather API. Built with React and designed with a clean, minimal UI.

title: Student Management System
description: A full-stack Student Management System to manage student records with CRUD operations. Developed using React for frontend and Spring Boot with PostgreSQL for backend.
